current_school.name: Shelby Academy Elementary
concerns: Ranked #1158 out of 1,230 schools in KY
current_school.transfer_status: Active - can transfer anytime a seat opens

Greathouse/Shryock Traditional.notes: Parents praise academic rigor and caring staff. 'Best experience ever' per parent review.

Norton Commons Elementary.notes: 4.5/5 GreatSchools rating. 'Couldn't be happier' per parent review.

Goshen Elementary.notes: Strong parent satisfaction for individualized learning. 'We love it' - parent of 3-year student.

Anchorage Independent.notes: Top-rated but check district boundaries. A rating on Niche.

JCPS School Choice Office.notes: Primary contact for all transfer questions. Office at 4309 Bishop Lane.

action_items.task: Monitor JCPS portal daily at 7am for seat openings
Schedule meeting with Shelby principal (week of July 15)
Get daughter assessed at Sylvan Learning for documentation
Research and tour 2-3 private schools as backup
Call Office of School Choice weekly
Document any anxiety about starting at Shelby
